gbaGames.name: Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo Revival
gbaGames.author: Capcom
gbaGames.description: Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo Revival is an Arcade fighting game to go against your friends! You can do super power puches to dominate your enemy's!

gbaGames.name: Super Street Fighter 3 Alpha
gbaGames.author: Capcom
gbaGames.description: Super Street Fighter 3 Alpha is an Arcade fighting game to go against your friends! You can do super power puches to dominate your enemy's!

gbaGames.name: Mortal Komat Advance
gbaGames.author: Virtucraft
gbaGames.description: Mortal Kombat Advance allows players to take control of one of multiple playable characters from the Mortal Kombat series, where you fight against a computer or player-controlled opponent one-on-one. The game allows you to use various combo moves, as well as fatalities at the end of the fight.

gbaGames.name: Pokemon Fire Red
gbaGames.author: Game Freak
gbaGames.description: The plot follows the same storyline as Generation I, with the player beginning in Pallet Town. After meeting up with Professor Oak while trying to leave for Route 1, both the player and their rival are asked by Oak to choose a starter Pokémon, Bulbasaur, Charmander, or Squirtle, from the desk near him.

gbaGames.name: Pokemon Sapphire
gbaGames.author: Game Freak
gbaGames.description: Pokémon Sapphire will take you on a journey through the land of Hoenn. Your quest is to become the ultimate Pokémon Master through collecting, battling and trading. Pokémon Sapphire offers incredible graphics, varied gameplay and more than 100 new characters.

gbaGames.name: Pokemon Emerald
gbaGames.author: Game Freak
gbaGames.description: As with Ruby and Sapphire, the player's general goal is to explore the Hoenn region and conquer a series of eight Pokémon Gyms in order to challenge the Elite Four and its Champion, while the main subplot is to defeat two criminal organizations attempting to harness a legendary Pokémon's power for their own goals.

gbaGames.name: Pokemon Ruby
gbaGames.author: Game Freak
gbaGames.description: In the third generation of Pokemon games, the player roams the Hoenn region of the Pokemon world in hopes of catching all 350+ species of Pokemon and becoming a Pokemon Master.

gbaGames.name: Mario Kart Super Circuit
gbaGames.author: Intelligent Systems
gbaGames.description: Mario Kart: Super Circuit is a kart racing game featuring characters and elements from the Mario franchise. The player controls one of eight Mario characters and races opponents in karts around tracks themed around locales from the Super Mario platform games.

gbaGames.name: Mario Party Advance
gbaGames.author: Hudson Soft
gbaGames.description: The aim of the game is to collect all the minigames and Gaddgets that were scattered around Shroom City by Bowser, by completing quests assigned to the player by the various inhabitants of Shroom City. Gaddgets, invented by Professor E. Gadd, are interactive items such as a Morse code generator and a love meter.

gbaGames.name: Monopoly
gbaGames.author: Sculptured Software
gbaGames.description: Monopoly for your Game Boy Advance is a great way to enjoy the thrills of controlling the businesses of an entire town -- and maintaining it against your competition! Buy streets, put up houses and hotels, control the railroads and utilities and create a monopoly where you control the town.

gbaGames.name: Kirby and the & The Amazing Mirror
gbaGames.author: HAL Laboratory, Flagship and Dimps
gbaGames.description: The Kingdom of Mirrors has been invaded by a dark shadow and Kirby's going to need to call in for some backup this time. He's been split into four Kirbys of different colors and with his trusty cell phone, he can call up his colorful alter egos for a little help.

papasGames.name: Papa's Burgeria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: Papa's Burgeria is a cooking game of Papa game series in which you run the business of a burger restaurant. In this game, you can choose to play as either Marty or Rita. Like other cooking games, your task is to take the customer's orders, prepare and decorate the burgers, then serve your customer a perfect dish.

papasGames.name: Papa's Pizzeria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: Papa's Pizzeria is a game in the Papa Louie series, serving as both a spin-off sequel to the Papa Louie platformer and the first cooking simulator game (also known as a Gameria) in the series. It revolves around making pizzas for the various customers that visit Papa's Pizzeria.

papasGames.name: Papa's Freezeria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: In the restaurant management game Papa's Freezeria, you take control of a dessert business when the owner, Papa Louie, is absent. Serve the guests' favorite treats at several stations by accurately completing their orders. To receive the tips, try to serve every customer without making any mistakes.

papasGames.name: Papa's Cupcakeria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: In Papa's Cupcakeria, you take the role of a waiter who works in a cafeteria in the town of Frostfield. Your job is to serve your customers the yummy cupcakes you create and bake in your own kitchen.

papasGames.name: Papa's Scooperia
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: Papa's Scooperia is a casual restaurant management game where you embark on a journey to run your ice cream shop and bring joy to customers of all ages. After losing your belongings in Oniontown, you find yourself in a tight spot and must earn money to return home.

papasGames.name: Papa's Donuteria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: Papa's Donuteria is a casual restaurant game where you build delicious donuts for customers. Learn how to roll and cut the dough, fry it, and serve the donuts with a variety of sweet and tasty toppings. The days only get busier, so learn to work fast without sacrificing the quality!

papasGames.name: Papa's Pancakeria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: Papa's Pancakeria is a casual restaurant game where you grill pancakes and serve them with delicious toppings to customers. Play minigames and upgrade the shop as you progress. Learn to create perfect pancakes while juggling multiple orders at once!

papasGames.name: Papa's Hot Doggeria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: Papa's Hot Doggeria is a restaurant game where you serve hotdogs to spectators at a baseball game. Sound exciting? We thought so. Keep up with your customer's orders and deliver delicious dogs on time with various extras and toppings.

papasGames.name: Papa's Sushiria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: Papa's Sushiria is a casual restaurant game where you create sushi for customers. Learn the ways of a sushi master chef, rolling and slicing sushi rolls with expert precision. Add a range of savory toppings and serve! The days only get business, so make sure you can keep up without lowering the quality!

papasGames.name: Papa's Taco Mia
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: Papa's Taco Mia is a game in the Papa Louie series. It's the third cooking simulator game (aka Gameria) in the series, and is the sequel to Papa's Burgeria. It revolves around making tacos for the various customers that visit the establishment.

papasGames.name: Papa's Wingeria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: Papa's Wingeria is a casual restaurant game where you cook delicious wings for customers. Learn to serve the perfect plate of wings and purchase upgrades to improve the customer experience. The days only get busier at Papa's Wingeria, so work fast to deliver all the orders on time!

papasGames.name: Papa's Pastaria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: Papa's Pastaria is a casual restaurant game where you take charge of an Italian restaurant, serving delectable pasta dishes. Indulge in the culinary delights and experience the joy of running your Papa's pasta haven.

papasGames.name: Papa's Cheeseria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: Papa's Cheeseria is a game in the Papa Louie series. It's the eleventh cooking simulator game (aka Gameria) in the series, and is the sequel to Papa's Donuteria. It involves making grilled cheese sandwiches with fries for the various customers that visit the establishment.

papasGames.name: Papa's Bakeria
papasGames.author: Flipline Studios
papasGames.description: This big-time bakery serves the most sought-after pies in town, and gets plenty of foot traffic from some of the pickiest customers around. You'll need to prepare pies with delicious crusts and flavorful fillings, then top the pie with various crust designs, meringues, or crumbles before popping it in the oven.
